en.general.auto: :key is now set to `default`. Talk bot will use the best or default settings for :key.
en.general.nope: Sorry, only a server admin or server manager can do this.

en.who.okay: My :title is :mymaster, these members/roles are permitted: :permitted

en.follow.join: You need to join a channel before I can follow you!
en.follow.nope: Sorry, :name is my :title today. Get them to :command_charpermit you
en.follow.shorthelp: The bot will join your voice channel and speak what you write
en.follow.connecting: Cant follow, currently connecting to voice
en.follow.leaving: Cant follow until we've left voice
en.follow.permissions: I don't have permissions to join that voice channel

en.defaults.okay: Your voice settings have been reset :D

en.unfollow.none: I have no :title... would you like to be my :title?
en.unfollow.connecting: Cant unfollow, currently connecting to voice

en.permit.nope: Sorry I can't do that, you're not my :title.
en.permit.none: I don't see any legit names
en.permit.shorthelp: Permit someone else to use the bot whilst it's following you

en.unpermit.nope: Sorry I can't do that, you're not my :title.
en.unpermit.deny: Sorry I can't do that, you're not permitted.
en.unpermit.shorthelp: Unpermit someone else from using the bot

en.leave.nope: Sorry I can't do that, you're not my :title.

en.join.nope: Sorry I can't do that, you're not my :title.
en.join.none: You're not in a voice channel?

en.lang.okay: OK, The server default is :lang. You can override it with mylang
en.lang.shorthelp: Set the global server language. Use mylang for your personal language.

en.mylang.okay: OK, your personal language is now :lang.
en.mylang.no: Sorry, I cant find the language :lang.
en.mylang.shorthelp: Set the language the bot will speak in. eg. en-AU, gb, en-US, fr, jp etc.
en.mylang.more: You must specify a language code. You can find codes with `:command_charlangs`

en.myvoice.okay:
OK, your personal voice is now :voice. 
 Notice! If you have set language and gender settings, they will be ignored until they are set again.
en.myvoice.no: Sorry, I cant find the voice :voice.
en.myvoice.auto: Now the bot will choose the best voice and use your lang and gender settings.
en.myvoice.more: Your current voice is :voice. Run `:command_charlangs` to see the available langs, `:command_charvoices lang` to see the voices.
en.myvoice.noped: Your :command_charmyvoice setting has been overriden and you must use the command again to enable.

en.tolang.nope: Sorry, I dont have a voice for :lang
en.tolang.shorthelp: Translate your text to a different language eg. en, fr, jp, de etc.

en.mygender.okay: OK, your personal gender is now :gender.
en.mygender.shorthelp: Set the gender the bot will speak with
en.mygender.usage: Set the gender the bot will speak with. Your current gender is :gender

en.mypitch.okay: OK, your personal pitch is now :pitch.
en.mypitch.shorthelp: Alter the pitch of the bot's voice. Valid values are -20 to 20
en.mypitch.usage: Set the pitch the bot will speak with. Your current pitch is :pitch

en.myspeed.okay: OK, your personal speed is now :speed.
en.myspeed.shorthelp: Alter the speed the bot talks. 1.0 is the default. Valid values are 0.25 to 4.0
en.myspeed.usage: Set the speed the bot will speak with. Your current speed is :speed

en.sfx.nope: Sorry, only a server admin can set emojis
en.sfx.noper: options: [URL: play sfx] | [command url: make an audio emoji]
en.sfx.needshttps: Sound URLs can only be https urls
en.sfx.shorthelp: Associate words or emojis with sound effects. :command_charsfx set [emoji] [audio file url]
en.sfx.nodelete: You need to specify an action to perform such as set or del
en.sfx.usage: Associate words or emojis with sound effect files

en.sfxusage.soundurl: Add https sound Url to a word

en.sidle.shorthelp: Take control of the bot from someone else
en.sidle.nope: You have to be an admin on this server to use this
en.sidle.broken: Something went wrong getting the voice channel, you might still have been made the :title

en.transfer.nopermissions: You need to have Manager Server permissions of be a server admin to do this.
en.transfer.args: Doesnt look like you typed that command right
en.transfer.novoice: I need to be in a voice channel first
en.transfer.broken: Hmmm that didnt work on submit a bug on github at https://github.com/nullabork/talkbot
en.transfer.shorthelp: Transfer control of the bot to another person
en.transfer.channelpermissions: I don't have permission to join the voice channel for my new :title

en.help.shorthelp: Show all the available commands. Get detailed help information using :command_charhelp [command]

en.langs.okay:
```css
 :table 
```
 You can set your language with the `Code` or the `Alt` values.
For example:
`:command_charmylang au`

en.voices.okay:
```css
 :table 
```
 You can set your voice with the `Voice` or the `Alias` values.
For example:
`:command_charmyvoice sally`
en.voices.more:
You must specify a language code. eg `:command_charvoices au`.
You can find language codes with :command_charlangs

en.textrule.needsFind: You need to provide a word to find
en.textrule.none:
Cannot find :find,
Try copying the rule name from `:command_chartextrule list`, even the `\` characters if there are any.
en.textrule.needsReplacement: Your replacement value does not seem to be valid
en.textrule.nope: Sorry you don't have permission to manage this server
en.textrule.norules: No text replacement rules have been setup

en.import.error: Could not Import File. Try googling INI file fomat.
en.import.invalid: Cannot find any valid data. current supports, :supports

en.textruleusage.title: Text replacement rules
en.textruleusage.command_regex: Find <find> and replace it with <replacement> using regular expressions

en.details.shorthelp: Get your's or others voice details

en.mute.unmuted: Looks like you were muted, you have been unmuted.
en.mute.shorthelp: Mute yourself so your text is not read out

en.unmute.unmuted: Looks like you were muted, you have been unmuted.
en.unmute.shorthelp: Unmute yourself so all your text is read out

en.tts.notpermitted: You have to be permitted to use this command
en.tts.notinchannel: Get the bot to follow you using :command_charfollow before using this command

en.stop.nope: Sorry you need to be permitted or a server manager to stop voice
en.stop.shorthelp: Stop the current text from being read out

en.restrict.current: The bot is currently restricted to :restrictions
en.restrict.usage:
:command_charrestrict none - allow talkbot to listen on all channels
:command_charrestrict #channel - restrict talkbot to listen on #channel
en.restrict.nopermissions: You need have Manage Server permissions to alter the channels Talkbot is restricted to
en.restrict.setdefault: The bot will now listen on all channels
en.restrict.okay: I'll only listen on these channels now: :channels
en.restrict.shorthelp: Restrict talkbot to listen for freetext on specific channels

en.restrictusage.title: Restrict the channels to listen for text
en.restrictusage.description: The bot is currently restricted to these channels :restrictions
en.restrictusage.none: Allow the bot to listen on all channels
en.restrictusage.channels: Restrict the bot to only listen on these channels

en.keep.usage:
You must include the number of messages to delete.
Use `:command_charkeep all` OR `:command_charkeep <number>`
en.keep.keepCount:
I am now just remembering the latest **:count** messages.
Use `:command_charkeep all` to not delete any message.
en.keep.all: Okay I will now keep all messages and not delete any! ;)
en.keep.shorthelp: Specify how many messages to keep, the rest will be deleted.
en.keep.nope: You need have Manage Server permissions to alter the number of messages Talkbot keeps
